hero.title: Free. Easy. Better.
hero.paragraph: pearOS is the free alternative to MacOS while having the ability to enjoy all the advantages of an open-source Linux distro.

section1.title: pearOS: a new base, a new design, a new everything
section1.paragraph: The greatest release of pearOS is NiceC0re. An arch based Linu Distro made to look a bit different than the current pearOS versions. This version will be the main pearOS version, classic versions will be still developed, by the tradition, every time when Apple releases a new macOS version

section2.title: The pearOS installer
section2.paragraph: pearOS NiceC0re is the first pearOS version to try the new installer, installer made in Electron with nodeJS, which is, at the moment, quite unstable, since it is a beta, and the installer is still in development.

section3.title: Purpose of the OS
section3.paragraph: The biggest purpose of this Linux Distro is to get the smoothet Linux experience, with lots of animations, blur, and effects.

questions.question: What is NiceC0re?
questions.answer: NiceC0re is an alternative for the current pearOS versions, made to look different than the actual macOS versions, with own design

questions.question: What is pearOS NiceC0re based on?
questions.answer: Arch Linux, with KDE Plasma as Desktop Environment

questions.question: What are the basic system requirements for pearOS?
questions.answer: Anything that can run Windows 7 with Aero Effects, can run pearOS with no problem

questions.question: How stable is pearOS?
questions.answer: At the moment, pearOS might have bugs, since there is only one developer, I can't do everything perfect

questions.question: Where do I submit Bugs that I found?
questions.answer: The ways to submit a bug found in pearOS can be found by navigating to the Support page

questions.question: How many developers are in pearOS?
questions.answer: There is only one developer, Alexandru BÄƒlan, but community can help developing various things, a good example would be Andrei Muntean, who designed and developed this website.
